summary: A woman's husband has disappeared on an expedition into the jungle. She hires a guide to take her into the jungle to find him. However, they discover that he has been captured by a savage female tribe.
cast: Robert Lowery|Patricia Morison|J. Edward Bromberg|John Miljan|Amira Moustafa|Keith Richards|Bruce Edwards|Wilson Benge|Jack George|Cay Forester|Vida Aldana|Hassan Khayyam|Darby Jones
keywords: jungle girl|poverty row film|low budget film|double feature film|damsel in distress
director: Director: Edward Finney (as Edward F. Finney)
title: Queen of the Amazons
